title: Caramelised butternut squash with grapes and pine nuts
ingredients: ['40g pine nuts', '1kg butternut squash - peeled, seeded and cubed', '225g seedless red grapes', '75g chopped onion', '2 tablespoons extra-virgin olive oil', '1/2 teaspoon sea salt', '1/4 teaspoon freshly ground black pepper', '6 fresh sage leaves, chopped']
